alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 12:57AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Wakulla, Jefferson, northwestern Taylor and southeastern Leon Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 1257 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Thomasville to 8 miles southeast of Tallahassee to near Woodville. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodville, Monticello, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Wakulla, Newport, Cody, Shadeville, Hells Half Acre, Lamont, Nash, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Chaires, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs and Natural Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon
